title: DePaul University | DePaul University, Chicago
content: DePaul University Recent Apply Online Request Info Visit Campus DePaul University>@iamDePaul @iamDePaul I am DePaul. You are DePaul. We are DePaul. This account was created in 2014 as a unique way of capturing the experiences and campus involvement of DePaul’s undergraduate students. This account’s guidelines adhere to the ‘Guiding Principles for Speech and Expression at DePaul University’ and affirm the rights of the DePaul community to engage in free speech and open expression respectfully. It is possible for comments and opinions to be deleted from the account without the University's consent. Please know, we support throughout the entire DePaul community, free speech and open expression that is civil and respectful. However, no form of student expression should be construed as the University’s endorsement of particular ideas, except when officially stated otherwise. Interested in being featured as an @iamdepaul student?
